snippet: The families of four South Korean sailors held hostage by Somali pirates for more than 17 months appealed to the government to intervene on their release.
abstract: Families of four South Korean sailors held hostage by Somali pirates for more than 17 months appeal to the government to intervene for their release.
lead_paragraph: The families of four South Korean sailors held hostage by Somali pirates for more than 17 months appealed to the government to intervene on their release.

headline.seo: Families of South Korean Sailors Held by Pirates Ask for Help
headline.main: Families of South Korean Sailors Held by Pirates Ask Seoul for Help
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Families Plead for Help to Free Hostages
